lead_paragraph: Jacksonville Jaguars left tackle Khalif Barnes drove through a yard, crashed into a tree and then left the accident scene last weekend, the police said. Barnes, already on probation for a drunken driving charge, was cited for careless driving and leaving the scene of an accident. He also was charged with violating a provision of his probation that limited his driving to work purposes.
